analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhave cakkhusmiṃ chanda rāgaḥ upakkileso

original: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu chasu ṭhānesu cetaso upakkileso pahīno hoti, nekkhammaninnañcassa cittaṁ hoti.
analyzed: yatas kho bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ imesu chasu ṭhānesu cetasaḥ upakkilesaḥ pahīnaḥ hoti nekkhamma ninnam cassa cittam hoti

original: Nekkhammaparibhāvitaṁ cittaṁ kammaniyaṁ khāyati, abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyesu dhammesū”ti.
analyzed: nekkhamma paribhāvitam cittam kammaniyam khāyati abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyesu dhammesu
